java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Auctioneer, QuoteProvider, AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable
public class McAfeeClearingHouseAuctioneer
extends ClearingHouseAuctioneer

An implementation of the mechanism described in "A Dominant Strategy Double Auction" R. Preston McAfee Journal of Economic Theory Vol 56 pages 434-450 1992

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
